articles.description: Both Motorola phones are solid options if your budget is under $200 -- and if you're trying to decide which one to get, we're here to help.
articles.content: Though Motorola has a few choice premium phones, like the foldable Razr phone and the 5G-enabled Edge Plus, the phone maker is mostly known for its affordable, well-made handsets. Case in point, its … [+13405 chars]
